trends: There have been 63 other sightings in Fresno
There were no other sightings in Fresno on or around October 23rd 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsThe object I observed for 20 minutes was a hovering black dot, which was about 10 degrees above the horizon in the southwest (Fresno). I watched it sitting in my front yard. My mom couldn't see it, but it was really easy to miss. While watching, I noticed that the object was indeed moving slightly southwest because it was moving away from me and to the left. It eventually disappeared after blinking in and out of sight, which could have been happening because it was so far away. I have seen lots of strange craft in Fresno, at least 5 during my years here.
